summary: Web app with user management and product management features. Includes role-based authorization (Admin, User, Kasir). Users have accessibility/checklist options in their profiles.
architectural_notes: Role-based authorization system with three roles: Admin, User, Kasir
Admin role should have full access including adding products
known_issues: Add product button on product page fails with no authorization error even when logged in as Admin

existing_features.title: On the User Data page, add an Edit button/menu action to each user row that opens an edit dialog allowing modification of the user's role and permissions (authorization settings). The dialog should pre-fill the current user's role and permissions checklist, and save changes via the existing useAuth hook update function.

Fix the authorization check on the Products page (ProductsPage.tsx) so that clicking the 'Add Product' button correctly recognizes a logged-in Admin user as authorized and opens the add-product dialog. Investigate the permission/role check that gates the add-product action and ensure it properly reads the current user's role or permissions from useAuth.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add edit menu on each user page for editing authorization
